column8: Dear FunkyFrog,  We are happy that you found the room clean and the breakfast nice!   We would like to comment on your specific feed-back:  You write a review in November for a stay in January - so a lot of time has passed since you were here. We did in-fact have music players where you could dock your iPhone back then (for other phones you could connect to play music using a cable and apparently this cable was not there during your stay and we must have missed to replace it - so sorry about this). We removed the music players totally when the iPhone 5 became more common as the charging connection did no longer fit and as well the sound quality of more modern phones is now much better in case you want to play music in your room. We do, however, have charging cables for our guests to borrow for basically all phones in case they have forgotten their own charger. The same goes if you want to borrow a music player.  In each of our beds we have one feather and one non-feather pillow. And if you need more than one non-feather pillow it is clearly stated on the information sheet in the room where you find them. In the booking confirmation sent to our guests when booking it is clearly stated if you have booked the economy room and what it means. In the arrival information that is sent two days prior to arrival it is also clearly stated that you can inform you in advance in case you have any specific requests.
